name: Blasting Borrel
text:
At the beginning of the Duel, add 1 "Borreload Dragon" to your Extra Deck.
Can be used if your LP are at 3000 or below. Choose either 1 "Miniborrel Dragon" or 1 "Quadborrel Dragon" and add it to your Extra Deck.
This skill can only be used once per turn and twice per duel.
